Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Southbound Reroute near Ashland/47th
ShortDescription: Southbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via 51st, Damen, and 47th, due to a fire department activity near Ashland/47th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 51st, Damen, 47th, and Ashland, due to a fire department activity near Ashland/47th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Reroute near 131st/Ellis
ShortDescription: 34 South Michigan buses temp. rerouted SB: 130th, Ellis, Greenwood and 132nd NB:132nd, 130th and Eberhart due to, street blockage near 131st/Ellis.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 131st/Ellis , due to street blockage near 131st/Ellis.

Southbound buses will operate via 130th, Ellis, Greenwood, and 132nd including the normal route streets.

Northbound buses will operate via 132nd, 130th and Eberhart.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Reroute at Madison/Springfield
ShortDescription: #20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Pulaski, Jackson, and Hamlin.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Madison, Pulaski, Jackson, Hamlin, and Madison, due to street blockage near Madison/Springfield.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are running with delays near Laramie due to a sick customer.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are running with delays near Laramie due to a sick customer.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
